short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve the gradebook view on genesis

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BetterGenesis is designed to enhance your experience with the Genesis gradebook. By default, the gradebook view only displays a limited portion of your class. BetterGenesis expands this view, allowing you to see your entire class at once. This comprehensive view is not only aesthetically pleasing, but it also provides practical benefits. It enables you to compare the performance of your entire class at a glance, conveniently copy and paste your class list, and gain a better understanding of your class dynamics. Experience a better, broader view with BetterGenesis.
